title: Doom.3.BFG.Edition.Update.1-SKIDROW
description:
S  K  I  D  R  O  W
the leading force

proudly presents
Doom 3 BFG Edition Update 1

29-11-2012......Release Date <-> Protection..................Steam
FPS................Game Type <-> Disk(s)......................DOX

RELEASE NOTES

Read changelog.txt for information on updated content!

INSTALL NOTES

1. Run Doom.3.BFG.Edition.Update.1.exe
2. Install
3. Copy the cracked content from the SKIDROW folder to the main install
folder and overwrite
4. Block the game in your firewall and mark our cracked content as
secure/trusted in your antivirus program
5. Play the game
6. Support the companies, which software you actually enjoy!

ADDITIONAL NOTES

This update works also with the multi release from POSTMORTEM!

GREETINGS

To all friends of the family and honorable rival groups!
